mapper.insert: insert into cart(cart_num, id, pro_num, pro_info, pro_image, pro_price, pro_count) values(cart_seq.nextval,#{id}, #{pro_num}, #{pro_info},#{pro_image},#{pro_price},#{pro_count})
mapper.delete: delete cart where id = #{id} and cart_num = #{cart_num}
mapper.update: update cart set(pro_count=#{pro_count}) where id=#{id} and cart_num = #{cart_num}
mapper.select: select * from cart where id=#{id} and cart_num = #{cart_num}
select count(cart_num) from cart where id = #{id}
